title: National Cowgirl Museum & Hall of Fame
body:
# Visit the National Cowgirl Museum and Hall of Fame in Fort Worth, TX, where we provided six interactive multi-touch experiences as a part of an overall, incredible exhibit.

## ABOUT THE PROJECT

Whatâ€™s the best way to experience the Old West and personalities like Annie Oakley and Buffalo Bill? Visit the National Cowgirl Museum and Hall of Fame in Fort Worth, TX, where we provided six interactive multi-touch experiences as a part of an overall, incredible exhibit.
